title: 115_hr4533
content: This bill designates the Department of Veterans Affairs: (1) health care system in Lexington, Kentucky, as the quot, Lexington VA Health Care System,quot. (2) health care facility at 1101 Veterans Drive, Lexington, Kentucky, as the quot, Troy Bowling Campus,quot. And (3) health care facility at 2250 Leestown Road, Lexington, Kentucky, as the quot, Franklin R. Sousley Campus. quot,
